ygData.subject: Re: More Deity Hints er Spoiler has been posted.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I just got out of game from having tried to make those deities ... and yes indeed, the recipes do work ^_^.  Woohoo!  ^_^ However, I have one question
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I just got out of game from having tried to make those deities
... and yes indeed, the recipes do work ^_^. Woohoo! ^_^

However, I have one question ... has anyone actually gotten the
deities themselves to work? See, after handing them out for over an hour to
any newbie shaman, druid, or cleric I could find between Qeynos and East
Karana, I was informed by a shaman that he couldn't get it to work. Not in
a weapons slot, not in a general slot, no where. So has anyone found where
you are supposed to put these things? In a jewelry slot perhaps? I don't
know ... that's what I get for being a ranger and not being able to test my
own wares ^_^;;.

But anyway, if anyone can figure out where these puppies are supposed to
go ... or if the item is just broken ... then please, do tell ^_^.

Kishu Arashi
25th cycle Wood Elf Ranger
Xegony
"Hmm, my dolls are defective ... should I hold a recall?"
